title: 96/5/EC: Commission Decision of 13 December 1995 repealing Decision 94/514/EC concerning certain protection measures with regard to foot-and-mouth disease in Greece (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 December 1995 repealing Decision 94/514/EC concerning certain protection measures with regard to foot-and-mouth disease in Greece (Text with EEA relevance) (96/5/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall amend the measures which they apply to trade so as to bring them into compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
